ygData.subject: Wohoo!/ Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I went from 4th level to 6th level. I have never advanced more than 1 level in a night after reaching 3rd before. That was awesome!  I have a 6th
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I went from 4th level to 6th level. I have
never advanced more than 1 level in a night after
reaching 3rd before. That was awesome! I have a 6th
level magician that made level just after I created
Cronik. Cronik took 4 days the Magician took 4 weeks
plus some. At this rate I will be 30th next week ;) .

@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

That quest for the axe... I wield a 2Haxe right now that
I bought off a merchant, is it worth the quest? Does it
give XP/cash/magical axe? Who starts it and where are
they located?
What level is the head mushroom in Innothule Swamp?
Anyone do the Kukulk Helm quest?
Any other quests out there that a newbie SK can do?

--
Cronik
Servant of Thule the Pain Bringer
6th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenblood jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and they blood
same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood for Thule.
Thule make Cronik big feared. Make smash'm fun."
